title: He Runs
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 38 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR70L
description: The boy in this book always seems to be late--or does he just enjoy running? Students follow the boy as he runs to the bus, to the plane, to school, and finally, back home. The book continues to reinforce essential high-frequency words in repeated sentence patterns.
reviewWords: boat, plane, pool, school, store, train
phonics: Consonants : Associate the letter Bb with the /b/ sound
grammar: Verbs                : Understand that some words are action words
